website_summaries.verdict: A good protein powder that blends a variety of vegan friendly ingredients.
pros: Comes with a great balance of organic ingredients, such as peas and agave
Can use it in protein shakes, baked goods, desserts, and other dishes
Easy to mix with other ingredients without leaving an aftertaste
cons: Smell can be overwhelming in some dishes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for food allergies
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to all but 8 foods. This protein powder literally is keeping me alive right now. It’s pure, organic, and gives me much needed protein.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1980

customer_reviews.title: Stark reminder of swallowing 1 gallon of prep solution for colonoscopy.
customer_reviews.text: Revolting Taste you CANNOT cover up, not with raspberries, not maple syrup
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsweetened, complete vegan protein
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond grateful for this affordable, unsweetened, complete vegan protein. I mix it into fruit and veggie smoothies. It has no Sweetener at all (exactly what I wanted) so I can taste the fruit I use. I highly recommend this protein powder
customer_reviews.author: Sleeeepy

customer_reviews.title: Most EXCELLENT- Ever !!! 💜
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT Product !!!! No flavor aftertaste- mixes very well- I add this to almost EVERYTHING I eat - no kidding , it mixes in food = well= NO ONE should be eating SOY PRODUCTS @ ALL !!! This is BY FAR = = THE=VERY=BEST=Protein-Powder= I’ve EVER PURCHASED = I use it b/c it’s VERY HEALTHY & Made Well 💜 I get this now every two weeks = Auto send = TRY IT = youll LOVE IT 😍 LIKE I DO .... HealthyAmerica777
customer_reviews.author: Kim Glass

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!!! Contains lead!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and prior to opening there was a warning (specifically for CA residents) that there is LEAD in the product. So I never opened it. I ordered thinking it is an organic and healthy product yet it has LEAD in it, a known toxin! I was blown away as this was NOT stated when I purchased. So luckily I was able to receive a refund. It says I don’t have to return the product, but I will NOT be using it or giving it to any loved ones. So buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: TQS

customer_reviews.title: Few, simple ingredients = PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I can't tolerate most protein powders but this one I have no trouble with. There's no added sugar or sugar substitutes so it's perfect! I use plant based chocolate protein milk, a banana and PB2 with it so I don't need added flavors or sugar.
customer_reviews.author: VS RN

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to our smoothies. Pretty good taste for plant protein. Of course we had a lot of other stuff too, it's just that if I don't add a little of this, I miss it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly the painter

customer_reviews.title: Great, Yummy, Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein powder. It doesn't have any offensive taste, and works perfectly in smoothies and shakes. Would recommend and buy again. I have a sensitive stomach, and this doesn't give me any irritation or bloating.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I add a spoonful to the smoothies, the taste is not bad, I bought it to consume it during my pregnancy and my OBGYN said it is safe to consume through pregnancy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: I drink smoothies every day and was looking for a protein powder without any flavors. And so I found it! I cannot taste it in my smoothie and I don't have a sandy taste. This is the best plant protein powder so far! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Renatik

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein powder! I use it every day after my workout. I blend together one banana, one cup almond milk, two scoops of this protein, and a few ice cubes. Reminds me of a milkshake! Really delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Mora

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Tasting!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have listened to the handful of reviewers that said this stuff is nasty! I was searching for an unflavored protein powder and this brand came up in my search results. I failed to notice that this does not claim to be unflavored, so that’s on me. I only used 1 scoop rather than the 3 scoop suggested serving to our 16 oz smoothie, which my spouse and I both had to choke down! That 1 scoop completely changed the taste of our usual smoothie drink! I will not use it again and now I have an entire bag that I guess is going in the trash ☹️
customer_reviews.author: DuchessOfLansdale

customer_reviews.title: Completely disgusting!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the fact that I had to buy a minimum of 2 bags first of all. Second, other people were saying it doesn't have much of a taste. I figured it had to taste like something so I only used half a serving in my smoothie. Completely changed the taste of the usual smoothie I drink every day and it's totally disgusting. Don't want to try using it in anything else so it was a waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jane_England

customer_reviews.title: I juice and was hoping it would mix into my ...
customer_reviews.text: I juice and was hoping it would mix into my juice well, but it doesn't. I add it to my hot grains Cereal I make. Blends well, doesn't have a taste but it changes the texture.
customer_reviews.author: L.G.D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great plant protein - no belly pain or bloat!
customer_reviews.text: I’m dairy-free and gluten-free. Everything bothers my stomach. It is super sensitive. I found this beaut originally at Walmart but Amazon had the better deal. It does the job! No gas. No bloat. It’s awesome. Have it every day in my after gym smoothie!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Weber

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite plant based protein powder
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have a smoothie every morning for breakfast and I love this plant based protein powder because it blends well and it does not have a flavor. We tried other brands but do not enjoy vanilla or chocolate flavors because they taste artificial and are very sweet. It is very difficult to find one that is affordable and unflavored. We really enjoy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maribeth Redwine

customer_reviews.title: Great low carb, vegan protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product almost daily for a lunchtime smoothie meal using 1 serving with a handful of organic baby spinach, 1/2 cup strawberries, 1/4 cup papaya, 2 tablespoons organic ground flax and unsweetened almond milk and blend in a Nutribullet. Approx 4g carbs
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: It's a Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the texture and the convenience of taking a small bag with me when I travel. This ensures I get my protein no matter where I go!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not much flavor, but makes smoothies have grainy
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this protein mix. I do find that no matter how much I blend my smoothies, they still taste grainy with this mix. It doesn't have much of a flavor and it's easily masked in any smoothie, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Vol Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product so much I added to my prime pantry to receive monthly! I put three scoops in my post workout shake.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey Folger

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased multiple times. I add a scoop to my morning coffee and my afternoon smoothie
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: No taste
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It has no smell and mixes well. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Oomie55

customer_reviews.title: Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how nice this was, especially in smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Royalty

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. A little goes a long way in smoothies. So taste before adding more!
customer_reviews.author: Perception

customer_reviews.title: Organic and all natural!!!
customer_reviews.text: A healthy smoothie before or after a workout! A great meal replacement too!
customer_reviews.author: Bright

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little chalky and lower protein than I'd prefer but blends well in smoothies
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lesmeister

customer_reviews.title: Very grainy
customer_reviews.text: Pronounced grainy texture when mixed as a smoothie that's not present in the superfood blend version.
customer_reviews.author: Tim&Katie

customer_reviews.title: Add it to any food
customer_reviews.text: Can add it to any food as it doesn't have a flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer strickland

customer_reviews.title: Curbs appetite
customer_reviews.text: This pea protein is by far way better than even amazing grass! Taste good, keeps me feeling full for hours...
customer_reviews.author: Analicia De Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Awful taste.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to make it work with frozen berries and bananas but the protein powder is too over powering.
customer_reviews.author: J26kw

customer_reviews.title: Tastes so bad !
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy. Expires by 05/2017 as someone has already commented. Even if you can choose to ignore it, this stuff tastes so bad. As a post workout shake , it will be a bad end to a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Alright_I_will_write_a_review

customer_reviews.title: The fact that it stated Organic plant protein is most ...
customer_reviews.text: The fact that it stated Organic plant protein is most satisfying but there is warning concerning lead. ..this I find very disturbing. ...and surely would have prevented me from buying this product. ..
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy thus product. I receive this product today with an expiration date for 05/17.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya Brooks

customer_reviews.title: This product was terrible, it tasted extreamly bad
customer_reviews.text: This product was terrible, it tasted extreamly bad, it made me vomit and i have a strong stomach, also it expired like a month after i purchased, I would not EVER buy this again, i wish i could get my money back. it was awful.
customer_reviews.author: Leaftys

customer_reviews.title: Vegan Protein
customer_reviews.text: My go to for a Vegan Protein supplement. Since the primary ingredient is Peas it tastes like peas. I tried mixing it with chocolate almond milk and peanut butter , but the pea flavor still dominated. Then I tried curry powder and it tastes like a Samosa (without the carbs of the crust and potatoes) so this is my morning after-workout drink.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Protein
customer_reviews.text: I use it in oatmeal to give me a protein boost
customer_reviews.author: emmer

customer_reviews.title: The flavor is pretty gross
customer_reviews.text: The nutritional value of this product is great but the taste of it is SO BAD
customer_reviews.author: Bay Anne

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of this Protein Powder. It is light, easy to digest. excellent quality. I always buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk Food, horrible taste
customer_reviews.text: Pea protein is a highly processed food substitute with possibly dangerous by-products. They had to add vitamins bec/ the powder has no nutritional value. They added "natural flavorings" (god knows what), MSG type flavoring and other junk. This product is not "vegan" as it does not even resemble real vegetable food. It may contain LEAD. AVOID
customer_reviews.author: IloveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great for IBS
customer_reviews.text: Helpful for IBS. I’ve been researching the best foods to eat for sufferers of IBS and this protein powder fits the bill. I’ve tried a ton of protein powders in my life and this one beats them all...even the really expensive ones! What I LOVE: -Doesn’t cause ANY IBS symptoms!!!! -Blends really well. No grittiness, clumps or lumps! -Doesn’t have a “flavor” so your other ingredients shine through. - Dislike: -Serving size on the package is confusing. The nutrition label states a serving is 3 scoops but the written directions say to use 2 scoops.
customer_reviews.author: Justpeachy85

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Have tried so many protein powders & can’t stand the flavor of stevia which is used in almost every single powder I have tried. I love that this powder is simple, no long list of ingredients. I add this to my fruit smoothies & no one can even tell it’s in there. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brigit

customer_reviews.title: Works good for muscle building
customer_reviews.text: I blend this with my smoothie and can never seem to cover up the taste but I don’t mind. It helps me grow my muscles and that’s why I bought it, not for it to taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Tastes awful
customer_reviews.text: I got this because i didn't want something high in sugars and a good amount of protein. Maybe I should have saw the terrible taste coming, but it is awful and now i have a whole bag of it. I tried multiple ways to eat this stuff and this powder ruins the taste of everything. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I like that it doesn't have strong taste like hemp protein.
customer_reviews.text: Best vegan organic powder I've tried so far in my smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it for extra protein
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine at Costco the first time so exp date not a problem for me but going to order from Amazon this go around. I add this to my post workout protein smoothie for extra protein. Vanilla bean protein powder, pb2, liv fit superfood powder, unsweetened alm milk, ice and half frozen banana all blended. Amazing and like 35 grams of protein with this extra plant protein.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the flavor of this. Although it is 'unflavored' there is a taste, when I add even half a tablespoon into smoothies it over powers everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so my bad. but it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really sure why I bought unflavored, I thought it was vanilla... so my bad. but it works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YUK! Changes the taste of anything to horrible!
customer_reviews.text: YUK! Don't believe the line that it has "neutral flavor" and "no aftertaste to change the flavor of your foods". It does change things and it tastes horrible. It's better to buy a flavored powder you won't mind the taste of rather than this grainy stuff that definitely changes the taste of things!
customer_reviews.author: hershpersh

customer_reviews.title: What a horrible taste yuck!
customer_reviews.text: Usually you can mask the taste of a protein powder but not in this case. This tasted so awful I had to dump out my smoothie; there was no covering up that terrible taste...maybe that's from the pea protein. I'm wondering if I can use the rest in the garden so that it's not a total waste, otherwise it's going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Lauriro

product_meta.title: BetterBody Foods Organic Plant Protein Powder, 12.7 Ounces
product_meta.description: BetterBody Foods Plant Protein Powder is a superfood powder that delivers all-natural ingredients in a convenient powder that can be baked, shaken, or blended. It features just 3 ingredients—pea protein, quinoa powder, and natural flavor. With no fillers, artificial flavors, or harmful chemicals, this protein powder delivers 16 grams of complete plant-based protein in just 1 serving. Developed to be friendly for nearly all diets, our plant-based protein powder supplement is vegan, gluten-free, non-GMO, lactose-free, soy-free, and USDA-certified organic. Free of artificial ingredients, sweeteners, and fillers, this plant powder is an all-natural solution for on-the-go professionals, athletes, and health-conscious people. It can be hard to get all of the protein needed during a busy day, especially on a plant-based diet. The Plant Protein Powder makes it easy to get a good dose of complete protein. It delivers a natural, neutral flavor with no aftertaste, so you can add it to protein shakes, salads, oatmeal, and more! Whether you're a stay-at-home parent, a professional athlete, or a business owner, this plant-based protein supplement can make healthy living a more achievable goal. Men, women, and teens will enjoy the taste, convenience, and benefits that this powder brings! It can be added to your favorite recipe for an all-natural protein boost—without the discomfort that comes from dairy-rich or whey-heavy protein. Add it to your kitchen, pantry, office, or gym supplies today, and you'll have a quick breakfast or snack option that's natural, organic, healthy, and delicious.
feature_bullets: PROTEIN SUPPLEMENTS: Featuring 3 organic ingredients—pea protein, quinoa powder, and natural flavor—our Plant Protein Powder contains 16 grams of complete plant protein in every serving.
TASTY PROTEIN POWDER: With a neutral flavor and no aftertaste, this protein powder can be used in baked goods, breakfast shakes, and other culinary creations.
USDA ORGANIC: This organic protein powder is certified USDA organic, gluten-free, vegan, non-GMO, soy-free, and lactose-free so nearly everyone can enjoy it!
NO FILLERS: Designed to provide natural plant-based protein, this mix contains no artificial flavors or harmful chemicals. It provides necessary nutrients without any fillers for best results.
SUPERFOOD SCOOP: This versatile mix can be added to breakfast juice, pre-workout shakes, salads, and more! A serving size is equal to 3 scoops, and this 12.7-ounce bag contains about 17 servings.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
